title: Takane no Hana-san
overview: Hana is a businesswoman who works for a company that produces traditional sweets, looks like a Snow Queen and does not let down a young employee Tsuyoshi, scolding for every mistake. But in fact, Hana is in love with him to the point of unconsciousness, however, in the absence of romantic experience, she cannot really express her feelings. Will Tsuyoshi respond to her love?Based on the manga of the same name.
